property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have less ghost rock than each other player, you may discard an extra card at Sundown. Noon, Pay 2 Ghost Rock, Boot: Unboot your dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: After your opponent reveals a cheatin' hand during a shootout, they must pay the bank 1 ghost rock, if able. If your hand is legal, they pay you instead. React, Boot: After you pay another player at least 1 ghost rock, draw a card. If this is a shootout, draw an additional card. You may discard 1 card, or up to 2 if this is a shootout.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Text
property.value: After refilling your hand during Sundown, if you have equal or more influence in town square than each other player, draw a card. Noon, Boot: Boot your dude to boot an opposing dude with less influence at the same location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: If Joe is at deed you do not own, pay the owner 1 ghost rock to gain ghost rock equal to that deed's production.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Pay the opposing posse's controller 1 ghost rock. Draw a card and place it in your draw hand. Discard a card from your draw hand.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Before E Gui leaves play because you did not pay his upkeep, if E Gui is at a deed you do not own, boot the deed and gain ghost rock equal to the deedâ€™s production.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After an opposing dude moves to this location and that dude's controller has more ghost rock than you, that dude's controller must pay you 2 ghost rock. If they do not, boot that dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: 108 Righteous Bandits

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Choose your dude. Pay the opposing posse's controller ghost rock equal to that dude's bullets to make that dude a stud. If that dude has 0 bullets, pay 1 ghost rock instead. That dude has a maximum bullet rating of 4.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.value: Shaman 1

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Text
property.value: While Alexander is in town square, you may discard an extra card from your hand at Sundown. Noon: If Alexander is in town square, unboot Alexander.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Kung Fu 3

property.name: Text
property.value: Matthew can cast Totems as if he had Shaman skill equal to his Kung Fu rating (he does not gain the Shaman keyword while casting a Totem).

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Kung Fu 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Choose a dude in the posse opposing Feichi. Boot that dude. If Feichi has more influence than that dude, one of your other dudes at any location may join your posse (moving if necessary).

property.value: Eagle Wardens

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Shaman 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: If Geronimo is not at your home, discard a card you do not own attached to Geronimoâ€™s current location and gain 1 ghost rock.

property.value: Huckster 0

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Choose your unbooted Huckster at another location and Marias makes a Huckster skill check of 7. If successful, move that Huckster to Marias's location.

property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Boot your Abomination dude. Either boot an opposing attachment at this location or give Skinwalker +2 bullets.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Boot your abomination in the posse to gain 2 bullets||Boot your abomination in the posse to boot opponents goods or spell

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Fourth Ring

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Choose an opposing dude. Give that dude -2 bullets or boot a Weapon on that dude.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Choose an opposing dude. Give that dude -2 bullets. || Boot a weapon on opponents dude.

property.name: Outfit

property.value: Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon/Shootout: Move Kevin to a location with a Huckster or Abomination dude. If this is a shootout play, the location must be the shootout location. Kevin joins your posse. Kevin becomes a stud and if there is an opposing dude with grit 11 or higher at that location, draw two cards.

property.name: Outfit

property.value: Experienced 1-Deputy

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing wanted dudes at Wendyâ€™s location have -2 value. Shootout, Boot: Choose an opposing dude. Send them home booted. If they have bounty greater than their grit, discard them.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark an in-town deed you own whose cost is at least 2 ghost rock greater than its current production. If successful, the deed permanently gains +1 production.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If Dan is at in-town deed you own that has less than 2 control points, the deed gains a control point. After victory is checked during Sundown, if Dan has not moved, you may pay 4 ghost rock to make the control point permanent.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Discard a card and choose a dude with a Horse at this or an adjacent location. Unboot that horse. Its abilities may be used an additional time this turn. If you discarded a Goods, you may unboot that dude.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Morgan Cattle Co.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Boot your Ranch to move your dude at this or an adjacent location to another location you own or control.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: Give a deed the Rowdy keyword. This effect lasts until after the next Upkeep phase. (Control of a Rowdy deed is checked with bullets instead of influence.)

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Text
property.value: After Frank joins the mark's posse or a posse opposing a job, if he is wanted, he unboots. React: After posses are formed, if Frank is in your posse, send him home booted.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experienced 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Silas has a bullet bonus equal to his bounty, to a maximum bonus of 4. Shootout, Boot: Send an opposing dude with less bullets than Silas's bounty home booted. If Silas is the mark, he ignores the boot cost of this ability.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Sloane Gang

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Huckster 1

property.name: Text
property.value: React: After posses are formed, if Larry is in your posse, boot Larry 's spell to boot an attachment in the opposing posse and increase Larry's bounty by 1. If you are not the Winner, Larry must be unbooted.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Virginia is in a shootout, hand ranks cannot be modified by Shootout, React, or non-Cheatin' Resolution abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: After posses are formed, for the remainder of the shootout, hand ranks cannot be modified Shootout, React, or non-Cheatin' Resolution abilities. Dudes cannot be discarded or aced by Shootout or non-Cheatin' Resolution abilities during the first round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Private-Ranch-Out of Town

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon, Boot: If you are not the Winner, gain 1 ghost rock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller React, Boot: Before a non-token dude opposing your dude is aced in a shootout, give this deed a permanent +1 production. If that dude had grit 11 or higher, give this deed a permanent control point.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Gain 1 production. || Gain 1 production and 1 control point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a deed on this street or a deed you control. Reduce its control points and production to 0 until after the next Upkeep Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After posses are formed, if you own the mark, one of your wanted dudes joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Text
property.value: Controller Shootout, Boot: Send an opposing A-value dude home booted. Controller Shootout, Boot: Discard a Sidekick.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: Send A-value dude home. || Discard a sidekick.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After this dudeâ€™s posse succeeds at a job that didnâ€™t mark your home, this dude stays at this location instead of going home booted.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Experimental-Weapon-Gadget-Difficulty 5

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout, Boot: Give an opposing dude -1 bullets. Pull. If the pull was not a club, the opposing dude becomes a draw if they have 0 bullets.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude is a stud. This card cannot be attached or traded to a dude without the Harrowed or Abomination keyword. This card cannot be affected by opposing card effects. If there is an unbooted non-Melee Weapon in the opposing posse, Claws provides no bullet bonus and does not make this dude a stud.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gadget-Difficulty 6

property.name: Text
property.value: After you invent this Gadget, unboot this Mad Scientist and draw a card. React, Boot: After making a pull for a Gadget at this or an adjacent location, discard a goods card from your plan hand to make the pull's suit hearts.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatinâ€™ Resolution, Boot: If your draw hand is legal this shootout round, lower a playerâ€™s hand rank by this dudeâ€™s influence, to a maximum reduction of 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: React, Boot: After an opposing dude joins this shootout by a card effect, boot that dude. That dude does not unboot at Sundown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution Hex 3, Boot: Lower a playerâ€™s hand rank by 2. If this is a shootout, give an opposing dude a bullet penalty equal to their current bullets that lasts the remainder of the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Miracle 6, Boot: Choose your dude at a different location than this dude. This dude moves to the location of the other dude, and the other dude moves to the previous location of this dude. If you succeed by 6 or more, unboot one of the dudes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Miracle X, Boot: Choose an opposing dude. X is that dude's value. If that dude's controller reveals a cheating hand this round and you reveal a legal hand, ace that dude. This acing effect cannot be prevented.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Hex 6, Boot: Move your Abomination at this location to another location. Shootout Hex 6, Boot: Your Abomination joins your posse (moving if necessary).

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Spirit 8, Boot: Choose an opposing dude or your non-token dude. Set that dudeâ€™s bullets to equal to their influence, or 3, whichever is lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Spirit 9, Boot: Switch your total stud bonus and total draw bonus when making draw hands this round. You must have at least 1 non-token stud dude and 1 non-token draw dude in your posse to use this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Your dude becomes a stud. Each posseâ€™s controller may search their deck and discard pile for an action card with a Cheatinâ€™ Resolution ability, reveal it, and add it to their hand. If a player added a card to their hand, they discard a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Boot your stud at a deed you control but do not own. Boot that deed to gain ghost rock equal to your studâ€™s bullets, to a maximum of 3. You may ace this card to give that deed a permanent +1 control point and that dude a permanent +1 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Technique: Unboot this dude. They gain +2 Kung Fu, +2 bullets, and cannot move from this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon Job: Mark an in-town deed. Your posse must have 3 or more bullets. If successful, gain ghost rock equal to the mark's production and raise the leader's bounty by 2. If you do not own the mark, unboot your leader.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: Your opponent chooses a dude in their posse. That dude joins your posse under your control for the remainder of the shootout. After the shootout ends, if that dude is still in play, send that dude home booted. If your hand is legal, you choose the opposing dude.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout Technique: If this dude is unbooted, choose an opposing dude with bullets equal to or less than this dude's Kung Fu rating. Move both dudes to an adjacent non-home location (without booting and even if booted). Both dudes leave the shootout.

property.name: Text
property.value: This dude loses all keywords, traits, and abilities. This dudeâ€™s bullets, influence, and control points are equal to 0 and cannot be modified. This dude gets +1 upkeep. This card cannot be discarded by card effects. Noon Job, Boot: Mark an opposing dude. If successful, discard all cards attached to the mark and send them home booted; attach this card to the mark.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cheatin' Resolution: The cheating player discards their shooter. If your hand is legal, you do not take casualties this round and draw a card.
